login.subtitle: Manage your appointments, track your treatment, and access all your health information in one place.
register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Fill in your details to start using the patient portal.
register.error: Error creating account. Please try again.
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
register.success: Account created! Check your email to confirm.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Clinic system overview
dashboard.rejectionPrompt:
Rejection reason:

- Time slot unavailable
- Provider unavailable
- Other reason
dashboard.confirmWhatsappFail: Appointment confirmed, but the WhatsApp notification failed:
dashboard.rejectWhatsappFail: Appointment rejected, but the WhatsApp notification failed:
dashboard.cancelWhatsappFail: Appointment cancelled, but the WhatsApp notification for {{parts}} failed.
dashboard.whatsappSetup: Set up an instance in Settings - WhatsApp
calendar.title: Scheduling
calendar.helpTip: Tip: Click on an appointment to view details and change status. Use the buttons above to switch between month, week or day view. In week/day view, the height of each card represents the actual appointment duration.
calendar.helpTipAdmin: Filter by provider to see individual schedules.
calendar.slotWarning24h: Appointments require at least 24 hours advance notice
appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.patientEmptyAll: You don't have any appointments yet
appointments.cancelConfirmText: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment? Please provide a reason:
appointments.detail.title: Appointment Details
appointments.detail.lateCancelWarning:
Your appointment is in less than 24 hours.

Late cancellations may be subject to clinic policies.

Do you wish to continue with the cancellation?
appointments.detail.cancelPrompt: Please provide a reason for cancellation:
booking.title: New Appointment
booking.categoryPrompt: What type of care are you looking for?
booking.error24h: Appointments must be scheduled at least 24 hours in advance.
booking.errorConflict: There is already an appointment scheduled at this time.
booking.errorUnavailable: This time slot is no longer available. Please select another.
booking.errorGeneric: Unable to schedule the appointment. Please try again.
booking.noSlots: No available times on this date
booking.eligibilityEligible: You are eligible for this type of appointment
booking.eligibilityIneligible: You are not eligible for this type of appointment
booking.eligibilityCheckingDesc: Please wait while we verify your requirements.
patients.title: Patients
patients.errorRequired: Please fill in all required fields
patients.errorProfileCreate: User created, but error creating profile. Contact support.
patients.successCreate: Patient registered successfully! A confirmation email has been sent.
patient.deleteDocumentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
profile.title: My Profile
profile.avatarUploadError: Error uploading image. Please try again.
providers.title: Providers
providers.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email or specialty...
providers.deactivateConfirm: Are you sure you want to deactivate
providers.errorRequired: Please fill in all required fields
providers.errorDuplicate: This user is already a registered provider.
providers.subtitle: Manage providers and healthcare professionals
providers.emptyDescription: Start by adding the professionals who work at the clinic. Each provider will have access to their own panel with schedule and notifications.
providers.emailHint: If the email doesn't exist, a new account will be created automatically.
providers.reactivateDescription: The provider will be available for appointments again.
providers.deactivateDescription: The provider will no longer be available for appointments.
admins.title: Administrators
admins.description: Administrators can manage appointments, patients, and clinic settings.
admins.errorRequired: Please fill in all required fields
admins.errorNotFound: Email not found. The user needs to register first.
schedule.title: My Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Manage your availability and working hours
schedule.subtitleAdmin: Manage provider availability and working hours
schedule.clickDayHint: Click a day to edit shifts
schedule.noBlocks: No blocks in the next 60 days
schedule.helpTip: How it works: Activate the days of the week and set the working shifts. You can have multiple shifts per day (e.g.: morning and afternoon). Patients will only be able to book within these hours.
schedule.noProviderDesc: Your account is not linked to a provider record.
schedule.conflictMessage: There are appointments scheduled during this period:
notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Configure automatic appointment reminders via WhatsApp
notifications.subtitleDoctor: Configure when you want to receive appointment reminders via WhatsApp
notifications.errorDuplicate: A rule with the same recipient, provider, and time already exists.
notifications.emptyPatientHint:
Define when the patient receives a WhatsApp reminder before the appointment.
E.g.: 24 hours before, 1 hour before.
notifications.emptyProviderHint:
Send WhatsApp reminders to providers before each appointment.
Each provider can customize their own reminders in the panel.
notifications.emptyMyRemindersHint:
Receive WhatsApp notifications before your appointments.
Choose how long before you want to be reminded (e.g.: 2 hours, 15 minutes).
notifications.clinicDefaultHint: Rules configured by administration — apply to all providers
notifications.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the rule
notifications.deleteHint: The {{time}} reminder will no longer be sent.
notifications.templateHint: The template determines the content of the sent message
notifications.howItWorksDoctor: Create rules to receive WhatsApp reminders before your appointments. Each reminder is sent only once (no duplicates).
notifications.howItWorksAdmin: The system checks every 5 minutes for confirmed appointments that match the rules below. Each reminder is sent only once (no duplicates).
whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.subtitle: Manage your WhatsApp instances
whatsapp.scanQR: Scan the QR Code with your WhatsApp
whatsapp.clickRefreshQR: Click refresh to generate the QR Code
whatsapp.emptyDescription:
Create an instance and scan the QR Code with the clinic's WhatsApp Business.
Appointment reminders and notifications will be sent automatically to patients.
whatsapp.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this instance?
whatsapp.helpTipText: Create an instance, scan the QR Code with the clinic's WhatsApp Business and you're all set — appointment reminders and notifications will be sent automatically. Use only one number per instance.
failedMessages.title: Failed Messages
failedMessages.subtitle: WhatsApp messages that were not delivered
failedMessages.emptyDescription: All WhatsApp messages were delivered successfully.
failedMessages.emptyFilter: No failed messages for this filter.
documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Access your lab results, treatment plans, and prescriptions.
documents.emptyFilterHint: Try selecting another category or check for new files.
documents.emptyHint: Documents sent by the clinic will appear here.
documents.upload.title: Upload Document
documents.upload.dropzone: Click or drag a file here
documents.viewer.downloadHint: Use the "Download" button to view the document.
settings.title: Settings
settings.aboutText: Patient Portal - Manage your appointments, track your treatment, and access all your health information in one place.
settings.tabPageSubtitle: Manage clinic configuration, notifications, and integrations.
setup.title: Set up your clinic
setup.subtitle: Complete the steps below to get started
setup.allDoneText: Everything is ready to receive appointments.
setup.configureSchedulesDesc: Define when each provider is available
patients.subtitle: Manage patients registered at the clinic
patients.emptyRegistered: Patients will appear here after registering through the portal or being added manually.
patients.testPatientHint: Mark as test data — hidden by default, excluded from stats
providers.tempPasswordNote: Write down this password! The provider must change it on first login.
services.title: Services & Pricing
services.subtitle: Manage service catalog and pricing
services.priceHint: Leave empty for variable pricing (e.g. Fillers)
services.inactiveDesc: This service is hidden from patients
services.noResultsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filter
services.serviceKeyHint: Auto-generated from English label. Used as internal identifier.
services.errorRequired: English and Portuguese labels are required
services.errorKey: Could not generate a valid key
attendants.title: Attendants
attendants.subtitle: Manage attendants for WhatsApp chatbot human handoff
attendants.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, phone or email...
attendants.emptyDescription: Add attendants to receive handoff notifications from the WhatsApp chatbot.
attendants.name: Name
attendants.scheduleHint: Define when this attendant is available to receive chatbot handoffs.
attendants.deactivateDescription: The attendant will no longer receive handoff notifications.
attendants.activateDescription: The attendant will start receiving handoff notifications again.
attendants.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{name}}?
attendants.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. All schedule data will be lost.
attendants.fetchError: Error loading attendants. Please try again.
attendants.updateError: Error updating attendant. Please try again.
handoff.title: Handoff
handoff.subtitle: Human support sessions via WhatsApp
handoff.emptyActiveHint: When a patient requests human support via WhatsApp, the session will appear here.
handoff.emptyResolvedHint: Resolved session history will appear here.
handoff.fetchError: Error loading sessions. Please try again.
error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please reload the page to continue.
clinicSettings.title: Clinic Settings
clinicSettings.subtitle: Configure booking rules and clinic preferences
clinicSettings.bookingRulesDescription: Control how far in advance patients must book appointments. This affects the patient portal, admin calendar, and WhatsApp chatbot.
calendar.slotWarningMinHours: Appointments require at least {{hours}} hours advance notice
booking.errorMinHours: Appointments must be scheduled at least {{hours}} hours in advance.
